name: You are Legion
description:
Take turns with AI to control Legion and escape the lab, in this turn based sci-fi strategy game. Only Legions other minds have different intentions...

This whole game is playable just with a mouse(ie it requires a mouse), and revolves around selecting actions from the bottom of the screen and clicking on stuff until your Action Points run out.

You can see my "process" for making this in this here devlog!

If you played the game then tell me what you thought in the comments, and if you didn't then leave a comment to let me know why not.
